description.en: Tropical paradise with stunning beaches, islands, marine life, and vibrant nightlife.
description.nl: Tropisch paradijs met prachtige stranden, eilanden, zeeleven en bruisend nachtleven.

climate: Hot and humid year-round, Dry (Dec-Apr), Rainy (May-Nov)
geography: Two coastlines: Andaman Sea (west) and Gulf of Thailand (east). Limestone karsts, pristine beaches, and tropical islands.
culture: Relaxed beach culture mixed with Muslim influences in the south. Fishing communities and tourism-focused areas.
cuisine: Fresh seafood, southern curries, coconut-based dishes, tropical fruits. Spicier than northern cuisine with Malay influences.
transportation: Domestic flights to Phuket/Krabi/Surat Thani. Ferries to islands. Buses along coast. Longtail boats and speedboats.
budgetInfo: Budget: $20-35/day. Mid-range: $35-70/day. Luxury: $70+/day. Island prices higher, especially Phuket.
topActivities: Beach hopping, snorkeling, diving, island tours, rock climbing, sea kayaking, sunset cruises, beach parties
hiddenGems: Koh Lipe, Koh Tao diving, Railay Beach climbing, Khao Sok National Park, James Bond Island, Similan Islands
localFestivals: Full Moon Party (monthly), Songkran (April), Chak Phra Festival (Oct), Vegetarian Festival (Oct), Loi Krathong (Nov)
travelTips: Book island transport in advance. Respect marine life. Stay hydrated. Use reef-safe sunscreen. Check weather conditions.
whatToPack: Swimwear, reef-safe sunscreen, water shoes, quick-dry clothes, rain jacket, snorkeling gear, light evening wear, mosquito spray
